description: Project Manager - ui for managing nodejs projects
name: project-manager

scripts.deploy: npm i add-dependencies -g && npm i npm-check-updates -g && npm i nodemon -g && npm i
scripts.start: ncu -u "/^wf-.*$/" && npm update && (set NODE_ENV=production) && "node_modules/.bin/webpack" --silent --watch | nodemon --watch ./dist index.js
scripts.dev: ncu -u -n "/^wf-.*$/" && npm update && (set NODE_ENV=development) && "node_modules/.bin/webpack" --watch | nodemon --watch ./dist --inspect index.js
